plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bunnies love to munch on me!

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a tree. Sometimes Snow White likes to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make pie from me.

plant.question: I am yellow and sweet and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine.

plant.question: I am tall and have green leaves and a brown trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I lose leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am a flower that is often yellow and follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My face turns to follow the sun.
🕊️ My seeds are eaten by birds.

plant.question: I am small, green and grow in your garden. You can put me on a sandwich or in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a type of green.
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. People give me as a gift to show they care. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ I am often given as a symbol of love.
🌵 Be careful, I have sharp points!

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable. People carve faces in me at Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 👻 You can carve me into a jack-o'-lantern.
🥧 You can make pie with me.

plant.question: I am a long green vegetable with lots of little seeds inside. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?
I am a plant with a prickly outside and sweet, juicy inside. I grow in hot places. What am I?

bug.question: I’m a bug that can fly. I like to land on flowers. What am I?
I have six legs and I like to crawl. I sometimes eat your food! What am I?
I am small and red, and I have black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often found on plants!
🌱 I eat smaller bugs that hurt plants!

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I can sting you if I feel threatened. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I make something sweet for you to eat.

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. You can find me in grassy fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass!
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping!

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk!

bug.question: I glow in the dark! You can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am found on summer nights.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have long legs. I live near ponds and streams. What am I?

hints.text: 🪲 I am a type of bug.
🌿 You find me where it’s wet.

bug.question: I eat wood and can damage houses. I live in big groups. What am I?
I start as a caterpillar and then go into a chrysalis. I come out as something beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I can fly when I grow up!
